TextView.android:text: Overweight is divided into three stages: overweight (BMI in women is between 24 and 30, and in men - between 25 and 30), obesity (BMI in men and women is between 30 and 40), and severe obesity (BMI). in men and women it is over 40). To get a better idea of the type of your overweight, you should consult your doctor. Along with it, analyze the composition of your body by the percentage of fat, muscle and water. Overweight calculated by BMI does not necessarily mean that it is unhealthy or that the body is out of shape. Both men and women who train strength sports and have a high percentage of muscle mass can, as we have already explained in the section on normal weight, fall into the group of overweight.
